original_title: Sri Lankan MP detained for possession of Gold Biscuits
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Puttlam District MP Ali Sabri Raheem was detained by Sri Lanka Customs on Tuesday (23) morning for the possession of Gold Biscuits.
Ali Sabri Raheem was detained by Sri Lanka Customs at the Katunayake Airport upon arriving from Dubai on Tuesday (23) morning.
He was detained for the possession of 3.5 kg of Gold Biscuits valued at over Rs. 70 Million.
The Parliamentarian was detained by Customs Officers when he was at the VIP lounge at the Katunayake Airport.
The MP was moved out of the Katunayake Airport on Tuesday (23) evening.
